en.title: What’s red pocket based on blockchain?
en.desc: It is a flow way of virtual asset based on blockchain as the base core technology, and the Ethernet protocol is adopted to ensure that the bookkeeping is open, transparent and non tampering. The   process of red pocket is the process of virtual assets donated to other people.

en.title: What’s relationship between pocket and wallet?
en.desc: Both of the two is assets of user, just select wallet to set up red pocket must pay for some mainer fee as this will upload to blockchain.

en.title: Why you should select pocket or wallet before set a red pocket?
en.desc: The way to make account is different using pocket or wallet, and the later will based on blockchain and will cost you some miner fee.

en.title: How many ways you can get coins at the beginning of the account?
en.desc: You can get someone else's red pocket or transfer tokens from other virtual currency addresses.

en.title: Can I click my own red pocket and recevie coins?
How the system to deal with the remainning red pocket after it's expired?
en.desc: The platform will return the remainnings to you pocket.

en.title: what's can the red pocket do for you?
en.desc: Red pocket is not only a good carrier of information transmission, but also a medium of communication. You can build a friendship or business relationships through red packets.

zh_CN.title: 什么是区块链红包？
zh_CN.desc: 是一种以区块链作为底层技术的虚拟资产流动方式，采用以太坊协议，保证记账的公开透明和不可篡改性。发红包的过程其实就是将虚拟资产转赠给其他人的过程。

zh_CN.title: 零钱和钱包是什么关系？
zh_CN.desc: 零钱和钱包都是用户的资产，用零钱发红包，不需要扣矿工费，用钱包发红包需要交纳一定的矿工记账费。

zh_CN.title: 为什么发红包需要选择用零钱还是用钱包？
zh_CN.desc: 用零钱发红包和用钱包发红包的记账方式不同，用钱包发红包会记账到区块链上，同时也需要支付一定的矿工费。

zh_CN.title: 初始如何获取代币？
zh_CN.desc: 你可以通过领取他人红包，或者从其他虚拟货币地址转入代币。

zh_CN.title: 自己可以领取自己创建的红包吗？
没有领取的红包过期后如何处理？
zh_CN.desc: 系统会返回到你的零钱余额中。

zh_CN.title: 红包可以用来做什么？
zh_CN.desc: 红包是一个很不错的信息传递的载体，更是一种沟通的媒介，通过红包可以搭建朋友关系、商业关系等。
